solution_line_template: Mr. Gardner bakes a total of {cookies} + {cupcakes} + {brownies} = <<{cookies}+{cupcakes}+{brownies}={total_sweet_treats}>>{total_sweet_treats} sweet treats
Each student will receive {total_sweet_treats} / {num_students} = <<{total_sweet_treats}/{num_students}={treats_per_student}>>{treats_per_student} sweet treats
